title: i lost my account last  2 weeks i couldnt log in into my account and banned perm

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body:
i lost my account last  2 weeks i couldnt log in into my account i thouhgt that was from the updating servers or updating game data so i tried for the next day and i couldnt log in either so....last 4 days i think or 5 something like that i dont remember  i tried again to chick and i got acciese to my account that mean i could log in my account but i got this masseges that i got banned paremnt for something i didnt do while i spend 900$ on this account and called samih35 
please please help me and there is some pic from the messages. and here some other pic : https://imgur.com/a/VtVKh
https://imgur.com/a/W5D6u

replies.body: If you weren't the one who sent those messages and you think someone could have hacked their way into your account, I'd suggest hitting up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) asap! They'll be able to verify you as the owner and see if someone else might have had access when those games happened.
you deserved the permaban, have a good day sir.
i hope this happens to you after spending alot of money on ur account hf..

> [{quoted}](name=jerq23,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=9VpK3U2U,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-12-12T16:52:38.446+0000)

> i hope this happens to you after spending alot of money on ur account hf..

well, i don't have this problem, i am a free player.

GG.
